game.name: IRIS
game.categories: Single-player, Keyboard Only Option, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Control Iris, a messenger who walks through a spiritual realm, guiding lost people who seek peace. An action-platformer focused on music, combat, and atmosphere.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Control Iris, a messenger who walks through a spiritual realm, guiding lost people who seek peace. An action-platformer focused on music, combat, and atmosphere.
